targets.expr: rate(pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"postgres", application_name="PostgreSQL JDBC Driver", container="prometheus-postgres-exporter", state=~"idle in transaction"}[2m])
rate(pg_stat_activity_count{datname=~"postgres", application_name="PostgreSQL JDBC Driver", container="prometheus-postgres-exporter", state=~"idle in transaction (aborted)"}[2m])
